name: $100 Promo Pack
description:
Song or video in featured spot on hustlehearted.com/music 5,000 youtube views+100 likes+100 subscribers,MTV.com video placement,Music submitted to music blogs & thisis50.com(for an exclusive chance to have music blasted to 500,000+ of their members),tweet blast everyday for 2 weeks via @hustlehearted and other team accounts; 2 email blasts(within 2 weeks) to up to 1000+ current top djs,music libraries(possible opportunity which normally leads to high $$$$ payouts depending on uses),radio personal,A&Rs,music lovers(good for boosting itunes,reverbnation,etc sales) and labels(all in which we have personal relationships from past business work) ; music added to Hustle hearted playlist(which has over 40k+ plays in less than 2 months with fresh new music & leaks from artists like kevin gates,starlito, plies, future & more) ; 2 facebook posts on hustlehearted fan page; 5,000 twitter followers(non targeted).music submitted to online radio stations; music or video featured on hustlehearted.com/music for 2-3days(we get 5k+ visits every week)

NOTE:: send links for your twitter page, music and/or video link, facebook page, website,etc to hustlehearted.com/contact after you have paid for service with SUBJECT title "PromoPack"

If you have any questions about custom packages including: extra plays and/or views for other sites that your music or view is on, Vevo account submissions, LIVEMIXTAPES.com uploading/mixtape hosting, followers via instagram or twitter.--contact us @ hustlehearted@gmail.com with SUBJECT title "inquiry about extras"

name: Online Audio/song Mixing & Mastering Services
description:
Mastering is the process of taking a recording and enhancing it to its fullest potential. It's the fine-tuning that will make your mixes sound as “big” and as “clear” as possible without compromising the original feel or quality. This not only makes each song sound individually the best it can, but also makes the album as a whole sound consistent and unified.

Single song mastering is a fast and easy way to have your audio professionally mastered online, at a very affordable rate. This is a great low cost solution for artists who need to get just a song or two up to industry standards. And if you decide to use us to master a full album at a later date, we will credit you $25 for the song we have already mastered for you.

When you send us your audio for mastering, your tracks will be analyzed by an experienced engineer. After we get an overall impression of the existing sound balance, your song is then professionally mastered using an appropriate chain of top drawer analog and digital equipment.

Turnaround time for single song mastering is generally 2 business days. Upon completion, digital downloads will be provided (delivered electronically) in high quality WAV, AIFF, and MP3 format for each song. 

Service Includes:
Noise Reduction
Proper Equalization
Tube Compression
Mastering Reverb
Peak Limiting
Adding Ambience
Stereo Widening
Bass Enhancement
Maximization
Dynamic Expansion
Fades/Crossfades
Text/ISRC Encoding

Professional mixing is the key to improving your sound. The majority of serious musicians these days record and produce their music from within a home project studio, but don't have the mixing experience or equipment to compete with professional engineers working in professional studios.

We offer a unique and affordable mixing service geared toward the modern recording artist. From our state of the art facility, we provide inspired and accessible solutions for the classic digital recording dilemma.

Mixing Includes::
Professional mixing of your song to industry standards
Mix changes (We mix until you are 100% satisfied)
Fast turnaround (2-4 day turnaround time or less)

How does it work?
You send us the song to mix with a general or specific direction you want us to go in. We will process the song until we have completed the mix to our professional industry standards. Then we'll email you a link for you to download your new mix. It's that simple!

How do I send you my files for mixing?
The best way to send us your multi track session files is to send the individual tracks in WAV or AIFF format (don't change the sample rate or bit rate), all the tracks should be consolidated from the starting point of the session. Please label each file correctly (eg Main Vocal, Kick Drum, etc...) this makes it a lot easier when discussing possible edits an for general tidiness of the project.

Revisions
Once you hear our mix, there may be things you want to change about it. Simply call or email us with your change requests and we will implement those changes and send you another updated mix at no additional charge.


1. Prepare Audio & Upload
For optimal results please do not over apply compression, EQ, or limiting to the stereo master bus. However, you may add processing to the individual tracks within the mix.
Although its good practice to get a strong signal, don't let the audio clip. Getting your master bus to peak at a maximum of around -3dB to -6dB gives us headroom to work with your audio.
Please send files in WAV or AIFF formats only. We want high quality audio from the start for your music.
Use <html> https://www.wetransfer.com/</html> to upload your audio files to us instantly. Then, go to our contact page <html> www.hustlehearted.com/contact </html> and fill it out(in subject put transaction ID# ) then in message body provide the following info-->Artist Name -	
Contact Email -	
Contact Name -	
Contact Phone -	
Number of Songs -
**Also put the wetransfer link to your files at bottom**-

[[IF YOU HAVE MORE TRACKS THAN WHAT WE HAVE LISTED JUST CONTACT  US AT HUSTLEHEARTED@GMAIL.COM FOR QUOTE]]
Here's a video on How to prepare your songs/session for mixing & mastering.
<iframe width="420" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/HXvxPKGxp-I" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
